items.sentence: Tom says he has three other suggestions to make.
Tom says he wants to learn how to drive a truck.
Tom could think of no reason why he should stay.
How do you know Tom doesn\'t know what happened?
How do you know Tom won\'t want Mary to do that?
It\'s likely that Tom will be the one who comes.
It\'s not safe to go out after dark by yourself.
Tom is busy right now and can\'t speak with you.
Tom wondered which one Mary was going to choose.
Tom wondered who Mary had driven to the airport.
Tom wondered why Mary had dropped out of school.
Are you sure that there\'s no meat in this soup?
You should probably tell Tom to quit doing that.
I hope Tom doesn\'t do anything like that again.
I just can\'t believe that that really happened.
I want to get out of here before anyone sees us.
I made friends with many Americans at the party.
I\'ve seen Tom do some pretty remarkable things.
Let me think about it and I\'ll get back to you.
We\'re going to miss the bus if we don\'t hurry.
